description: Lists the Device Defender security profiles attached to a target (thing group). Requires permission to access the ListSecurityProfilesForTarget action.

parameters.name: securityProfileTargetArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the target (thing group) whose attached security profiles you want to get.

nested_items.name: securityProfileTargetMappings
nested_items.description: A list of security profiles and their associated targets.

nested_items.name: securityProfileIdentifier
nested_items.description: Information that identifies the security profile.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name you've given to the security profile.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the security profile.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the security profile.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
